Daily Routine

Arm workout, 3 days a week

    Bicep Curls
  • Stand with feet shoulder-width apart.
  • Hold a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing up.
  • Curl the dumbbells towards your shoulders.
  • Slowly lower them back down.
      • Hammer Curls
  • Hold dumbbells with palms facing each other.
  • Curl both arms up at the same time.
  • Keep elbows close to your body.
      • Overhead Tricep Extensions
  • Hold one dumbbell with both hands.
  • Lift it overhead, arms straight.
  • Lower the dumbbell behind your head by bending your elbows.
  • Extend your arms back up.
      • Lateral Raises
  • Hold a dumbbell in each hand, arms at your sides.
  • Raise your arms out to the sides until shoulder height.
  • Lower slowly.
